subject: Re: Inform the planet!?
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
What if what was writtn is totally mistranslated? 

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Wish He would, thing is He must follow what has  been written first, when 
> He does "come in clouds" at first, He will raise the  dead, I was told by 
> David the Tech, that it will be only the material physical  matter left from 
> those Christians that died over the years, that will just  vanish from where 
> ever they are, He will use Holy Spirit to do this, HS is the  most powerful 
> force in the Universe, He can be a soft as a kitten's fur, and  tougher than 
> molten lava! 
>  
> After the dead rise they will form into new  body's spirit type, but 
> different then the way it is now, we who are in  body's now, will then be changed, 
> in essence we will die, so quickly we will not  realize what happened, and 
> will leave the physical world, the physical body  changes, and we become a 
> new physical/spirit being and we will be taken into  Heaven for about 2.5 
> years it would have been 3 full years our time, but it's  been moved up 
> somewhat.
>  
> People left on Earth will have a terrible time  here, with wars, no food, 
> water, you know the rest...about that time the  antichrist will step in to 
> control Europe, David told me, the antichrist will  not get the US, Canada, 
> England, Australia, or even Russia, because these  countries will give him too 
> hard a time.  The antichrist was some man born  in Spain, and is now living 
> in Rome, is about 30 years old right now, and he  will come into power by 
> his charm, and fool many at first he will be a nice guy,  fooling all 
> county's but the ones I mentioned.
>  
> After a couple years he will demand to be  worshiped as God, and will have 
> people believe he is JC, though many will not  believe it, and it will be 
> made to suffer without food, and water, living will  be terrible for 
> everything, and all except those countries I mentioned will  fall under his spell.  
> He will some how get a massive war started up, but  he won't stay in power 
> very long though, because the real Jesus will then return  with all of us, 
> must be gonna be some kind of event horizon or something, and  then He will  
> rebuild the Earth, set up His place of residence in  Jerusalem, which all will 
> visit, we will all have fresh new physical/spirit type  body's, if you lost 
> a tooth in the current body, you will have a new tooth back,  if you lost a 
> limb, that limb will be back, but the new physical/spiritual type  body's 
> will be stronger, and last us, JC will be here living with us for 1000  years 
> our time, after that, is when He will return into the spiritual side  
> again, then afterward will return a different type of person, He will become  
> different in personality, and because, He now must be "The Judge."    (His 
> current personality is much too kind, heck he is letting people into the  now if 
> they are sincere with apology and repent from how they acted, and are  
> willing to make up for crimes done.  Those who are Christian now, will not  be 
> in that long line in darkness, now when they die, they are automatically in  
> light, that's why prayers, and leading them toward the light now does help 
> those  in darkness now to get "go to the light."  We hear them begging us for 
> help  everyday we turn on a "ghost box.")
>  
> This is when He judges the world, and those not  living in light, will get 
> stuck in total darkness, they will not suffer through  torture, God is not 
> into the torture thing, that is lies of Church to control  the people for 
> years, heck, God didn't even enjoy those burnt offerings, that is  why He came 
> to us through JC in the first place so, it wouldn't happen anymore,  but 
> some do not believe in what He did.  Those that do evil will just  disappear as 
> the Naphilim  did in the time of Noah, the energy from  their spirit's just 
> changed into something else or He took it back since He can  make evil 
> change into good things too.  While we are being judged, one at a  time, that 
> will take a long time too, He does the same thing now, that is why  the line 
> of those in spirit darkness is so long, David the Tech told me, and my  son 
> and grandson one day, that JC works pretty much 24/7 taking people into the  
> light, they enter, repent (say they are sorry) and mean it, then He talks 
> with  each person one at a time, taking about 10 minutes our time with each 
> spirit,  that person's guardian angel go into another room to talk, the Angel 
> opens a  "book of life" for that spirit, and they talk about what must be 
> made up over  there, then the loved ones, and pets  meet up, they all go into  
> another room to talk about things, then that person goes to their living 
> place,  given consul or whatever, some even go to school again, while others 
> must serve  out sentences in a prison but at least that prison is in the 
> light, it is where  they get those things they need to live on, some are still 
> in need of developing  a conscience, something they never developed on earth 
> when they were  here.
>  
> After He is finished judging this world, I was  told He will get to work 
> with that planet we call Jupiter!  Cool eh?   He will put water on it first 
> thing, it will take many thousands of years, but  it will develop into a great 
> new planet to live on, I know sounds very far  fetched, but this is what 
> David the tech says, believe it or not!  We live  and die on this planet is 
> like a drop of sand in a bucket when compared  to eternity.   David told me 
> that "God wants family, and  only asks for our love and respect, when we love 
> someone, we will respect that  person too."   Sorry, I got so wordy, now you 
> all can shoot me  down. <g>  sf
>  
>  
> In a message dated 2/21/2011 4:10:31 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
> eyedontwant2say@... writes:
> 
>  
>  
>  
> There is a group ''familyradio.org i think, anyways billboards all over  
> saying ''JESUS IS COMING MAY 21,2011. THEY THINK THIS IS  12/21/2012

> Been gettng something  aobut May 17th, now "they" say it starts May 
> 15th--I'm like WTF is this?  There seems to be othere that have pridistion 
> as well, but it's almost as  reliable as this stuff. This is from EVPmkaer 
> tonight, using the origianl  raw files I used ten years ago. 
> 
> "Thanks for writing Frank! However, it  was not me who made the 
> prediction....I was talking about a Christian  scholar who has done some 
> research and through his recalculation has  determined that the predicted 
> 2012 shift will be occurring around May 17th  2011...he also says this is 
> the 
> date when Jesus will be returning to  Earth. Very interesting, we'll 
> see......" 
> 
> 
> Soooo, whatever.  
> 
> F-S
